text: Pounder is an EP from Nuclear Assault, released on June 1, 2015. It is the band's first EP since 1988's Good Times, Bad Times, and their first studio recording since 2005's Third World Genocide. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ===Nuclear Assault=== * John Connelly – vocals, rhythm guitar * Erik Burke – lead guitar * Dan Lilker – bass * Glenn Evans – drums ===Technical personnel=== * Robert Blackburn – engineering * Thomas Johansson – mastering ==References== Category:Nuclear Assault albums Category:2015 EPs
title: Pounder (EP)
